questions.question_text: "appreciate" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: We appreciate your cooperation during the survey.
questions.explanation:
感謝する
販売する
遅らせる
取り除く

questions.question_text: "participation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of taking part in something
The act of creating a rule
questions.example_sentence: Your participation in the seminar is encouraged.
questions.explanation:
参加
規則を作ること
支払い
旅行スケジュール

questions.question_text: "expand" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To make something larger or increase its range
questions.example_sentence: The company plans to expand its partnership program.
questions.explanation:
拡大する・広げる
早く終える
情報を隠す
壊れたものを交換する

questions.question_text: "option" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: Employees now have more lunch options than before.
questions.explanation:
選択肢
最終決定
文書の誤り
必須作業

questions.question_text: "discount" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A reduced price offered to customers
questions.example_sentence: GreenBite offers a 10 percent discount at lunchtime.
questions.explanation:
割引
会議の依頼
旅行書類
掃除用具
